html:
Like slide on a smooth wave
Shine of stars at dark night
Chirping of birds at spring
Spring full of sun rays
Glance of expensive diamonds
Lack of cheap tears
Sip of water during heat
Heat that is so common
Iron cross smashed into the ground
Heretic kicked by the mob
Peon eating meat
Eating with his bear hands
Rotting corpse of a horse
Full of crawling maggots
Dog biting a dog
A man laughing out loud
title: Slide
